Question.Subject: Is there an online community for me?????????
Question.Content: I don't want myspace or facebook. I want a site where I can post my writing and chat with people like an IM. Where I can create a profile and check out other peoples stuff.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
There are so many now days where to begin so I really don't know you yet here is a site that lists 50 different types of social sites and there far more I hope you'll find a site.
http://www.doshdosh.com/list-of-social-media-news-websites/
Here is a guide to direct you to the one that's best for you: http://www.doshdosh.com/beginners-guide-to-social-news-sites/

Answer.Content:
There are so many now days where to begin so I really don't know you yet here is a site that lists 50 different types of social sites and there far more I hope you'll find a site.
http://www.doshdosh.com/list-of-social-media-news-websites/
Here is a guide to direct you to the one that's best for you: http://www.doshdosh.com/beginners-guide-to-social-news-sites/
Answer.Reference: The big list of all the sites WOW!!!! 83 of them and that's not all of them......... http://www.squareoak.com/blog/83-social-news-sites-categorized-by-niche/

Answer.Content: www.myyearbook.com is one. Or if you want to learn another language try www.livemocha.com
